# insertText(_:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts a character into the displayed text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func insertText(_ text: String)
```

## Parameters

- **text**: A string object representing the character typed on the system keyboard.

## Discussion

Add the character `text` to your class’s backing store at the index corresponding to the cursor and redisplay the text.

## Inserting and deleting text

- **deleteBackward()**: Deletes a character from the displayed text.
- **hasText**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text-entry object has any text.
